.. _find_x_y_ranges:
``find_x_y_ranges``
=======================

find_x_y_ranges

Description
-----------

get the extended ranges of x and y

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   find_x_y_ranges(data, extend_ratio)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``data``
     - data
   * - ``extend_ratio``
     - extend_ratio
